decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - Within the context of the planning permission P/1783/21 dated 27/07/2021, the proposed development would be significantly different in its design, and would introduce various new elements of development, resulting in a material change to the character and appearance of the host dwelling, street scene and wider area, and would also result in a material change in impact on the residential amenities of adjoining neighbours and would have a materially different impact upon local biodiversity. It would therefore require re-consultation of neighbouring properties, and the proposal would need to be re-assessed against the requirements of Policies D3 and G6 of The London Plan (2021) and Policies DM1 and DM20 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010). The proposal is therefore not considered to be non-material minor amendment.
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission P/1783/21 Dated 27/07/2021 To Allow internal alterations, the installation of new roof lights and alterations to the positioning and design of other roof lights, the provision of a rear terraces at first floor and roof levels, alterations to the roof forms of first floor rear extensions, alterations to front side and rear fenestration, the insertion of a new first floor side window, the removal of the canopy to the front entrance of the building, alterations to the design of the proposed rear dormer, alterations to the proposed rear patio, the provision of external lamps, and the incorporation of downpipes to the front and rear elevations of the dwellinghouse.
